page.description: Gather statistical information about the actual tables in the schema.
page.original:
SQL::Schema::UpdateStatistics() Syntax Result_Flag as L = &ltSQL::Schema>.UpdateStatistics( &ltConnection> as SQL::Connection ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagIndicates whether the operation was successful. &ltSQL::Schema>A SQL::Schema created with a DIM statement. &ltConnection>A SQL::Connection object created with a DIM statement.
Description The SQL::Schema.UpdateStatistics() method returns information on the tables in the schema for the specified connection. See Also SQL::Schema Object Limitations
